exceptions.exn: In environment d0, d1 : DTA H1 : match d0 with | dta p a => addr_in_preDTA p a end H2 : match d1 with | dta p a => addr_in_preDTA p a end Unable to unify "(reconnait ?M1851 ?M1854 \\/ reconnait ?M1852 ?M1854 -> reconnait (union ?M1851 ?M1852) ?M1854) /\\ (reconnait (union ?M1851 ?M1852) ?M1854 -> reconnait ?M1851 ?M1854 \\/ reconnait ?M1852 ?M1854)" with "match match d0 with | dta d0 a0 => match d1 with | dta d1 a1 => union_1 (u_merge d0 d1) a0 a1 end end with | dta p a => addr_in_preDTA p a end".

original: intros d0 d1 H1 H2. unfold DTA_main_state_correct in *. unfold union. simpl. apply union_semantics; auto.
